languages.text: Верховный надзиратель Веабоса-6 Грегорас Стракс нес свою службу с рвением, непостижимым простому смертному. Под его руководством тюремный мир стал образцом порядка и местом, заключения в котором преступники боялись сильнее смерти. Свой век Стракс доживал в сырой келье, пугающе похожей на тюремную камеру. От наград и почестей за усердную службу он отказывался, а любой компании предпочитал одиночество.

High Overseer Gregoras Strachs of Vheabos VI rendered his duties with a zeal unfathomable to the common mind. Under his leadership, the penal world became a paragon of order and a place of incarceration that criminals feared more than death. Strachs spent his final years in a small, damp room disturbingly reminiscent of a jail cell. He declined every award and honour for his assiduous service, and preferred solitude to any kind of company.

languages.text: Der Oberste Aufseher Gregoras Strachs von Vheabos-VI erfüllte seine Pflichten mit einem Eifer, der dem gewöhnlichen Verstand unverständlich bleiben muss. Unter seiner Führung wurde die Strafwelt zu einem Musterbeispiel an Ordnung und ein Inhaftierungsort, den Verbrecher mehr fürchteten als den Tod. Strachs verbrachte seine letzten Jahre in einem kleinen, feuchten Raum, der einer Gefängniszelle verstörend ähnlich war. Er lehnte jede Auszeichnung und Ehre für seine gewissenhaften Dienste ab und war lieber allein als in Gesellschaft.
languages.original_text: High Overseer Gregoras Strachs of Vheabos VI rendered his duties with a zeal unfathomable to the common mind. languages.text: Le surveillant en chef de Vhéabos-VI, Gregoras Strachs, s'acquitta de ses fonctions avec un zèle impensable pour le commun des mortels. Sous son égide, le monde pénal devint un parangon d'ordre, et un lieu d'incarcération que les criminels craignaient plus que la mort elle-même. Strachs passa les dernières années de sa vie dans une petite pièce humide étrangement semblable à une cellule de prison. Il refusa toutes les récompenses et tous les honneurs, et préféra jusqu'à la fin la solitude à toute forme de compagnie.
languages.original_text: High Overseer Gregoras Strachs of Vheabos VI rendered his duties with a zeal unfathomable to the common mind. Under his leadership, the penal world became a paragon of order and a place of incarceration that criminals feared more than death. Strachs spent his final years in a small, damp room disturbingly reminiscent of a jail cell. He declined every award and honour for his assiduous service, and preferred solitude to any kind of company.

languages.text: 维博斯六号星的高阶监察官格雷戈拉斯·斯塔克斯保持着常人无法想象的热情，一刻不停地履行着职责。在他的领导下，这个刑罚世界成为了秩序的典范。所有罪犯宁愿被当场枪毙，也不愿意来这里服刑。斯塔克斯人生的最后几年，是在一间狭小、潮湿的房间里度过的，与监狱牢房莫名相似。尽管他勤勤恳恳侍奉帝国，但却不肯接受任何奖励与荣誉，也始终过着孤独的生活，不愿与人为伍。
languages.original_text: High Overseer Gregoras Strachs of Vheabos VI rendered his duties with a zeal unfathomable to the common mind. He declined every award and honour for his assiduous service, and preferred solitude to any kind of company.

维博斯六号星的高阶监察官格雷戈拉斯·斯塔克斯保持着常人无法想象的热情，一刻不停地履行着职责。在他的领导下，这个监狱世界成为了秩序的典范。所有罪犯宁愿被当场枪毙，也不愿意来这里服刑。斯塔克斯人生的最后几年，是在一间狭小、潮湿的房间里度过的，与监狱牢房莫名相似。尽管他勤勤恳恳侍奉帝国，但却不肯接受任何奖励与荣誉，也始终过着孤独的生活，不愿与人为伍。

languages.text: El sumo supervisor de Vheabos VI, Gregoras Strachs, cumplió con sus deberes con un fervor incomprensible para una mente corriente. Bajo su liderazgo, el mundo penal se convirtió en un bastión del orden y una prisión que los criminales temían más que a la muerte. Strachs pasó sus últimos años en una sala pequeña y húmeda que recordaba preocupantemente a una celda. Rechazó todo premio y reconocimiento por su diligente servicio y prefirió la soledad a cualquier tipo de compañía.
languages.original_text: High Overseer Gregoras Strachs of Vheabos VI rendered his duties with a zeal unfathomable to the common mind. Under his leadership, the penal world became a paragon of order and a place of incarceration that criminals feared more than death. Strachs spent his final years in a small, damp room disturbingly reminiscent of a jail cell. He declined every award and honour for his assiduous service, and preferred solitude to any kind of company.

Bajo su liderazgo, el mundo penal se convirtió en un bastión del orden y una prisión que los criminales temían más que a la muerte. Strachs pasó sus últimos años en una sala pequeña y húmeda que recordaba preocupantemente a una celda. Rechazó todo premio y reconocimiento por su diligente servicio y prefirió la soledad a cualquier tipo de compañía.

languages.text: ヴィアボス・VIの上級監督官、グレゴラス・ストラッチスは、凡人には理解しがたい熱意をもって職務を遂行した。彼の指導のもと、その流刑惑星は秩序の模範となり、犯罪者が死よりも恐れる収容所となった。ストラッチスは晩年を、まるで刑務所の独房を思わせる狭く湿った部屋で過ごした。彼はその勤勉な奉仕に対するすべての賞や栄誉を辞退し、いかなる交際よりも孤独を好んだ。
languages.original_text: High Overseer Gregoras Strachs of Vheabos VI rendered his duties with a zeal unfathomable to the common mind. Under his leadership, the penal world became a paragon of order and a place of incarceration that criminals feared more than death. Strachs spent his final years in a small, damp room disturbingly reminiscent of a jail cell. He declined every award and honour for his assiduous service, and preferred solitude to any kind of company.

traits.locale_text: ヴィアボス・VIの上級監督官、グレゴラス・ストラッチスは、凡人には理解しがたい熱意をもって職務を遂行した。彼の指導のもと、その流刑惑星は秩序の模範となり、犯罪者が死よりも恐れる収容所となった。ストラッチスは晩年を、まるで刑務所の独房を思わせる狭く湿った部屋で過ごした。彼はその勤勉な奉仕に対するすべての賞や栄誉を辞退し、いかなる交際よりも孤独を好んだ。

languages.text: Vheabos VI'nın Yüksek Gözetmeni Gregoras Strachs, görevlerini sıradan bir zihnin idrak edemeyeceği bir şevkle yerine getirdi. Onun önderliğinde ceza dünyası, bir nizam timsali hâline geldi ve suçluların buraya düşmek yerine ölmeyi tercih edecekleri bir mapushaneye dönüştü. Strachs, son yıllarını rahatsız edici derecede bir hapishane hücresine benzeyen küçük ve rutubetli bir odada geçirdi. Dur durak bilmeyen hizmetinin bir karşılığı olarak sunulan hiçbir ödülü kabul etmedi, her türlü onurlandırma çabasını geri çevirdi. Birileriyle ahbaplık etmek yerine daima yalnız olmayı yeğledi.

He declined every award and honour for his assiduous service, and preferred solitude to any kind of company.
